solution_line_template: Originally the car parts would be a total of {part_price}*{quantity_bought} = <<{part_price}*{quantity_bought}={original_total_cost}>>{original_total_cost} dollars.
Clark got a discount for {original_total_cost}-{actual_paid_cost} = <<{original_total_cost}-{actual_paid_cost}={discount_amount}>>{discount_amount} dollars.
